In terms of anxiety, it's sort of making me a bit anxious, but overall I feel pretty good. I would def recommend this for anyone who has a high tolerance. It's hands down a night time strain.

‚ÄúOnce again I tangle with this berrylicious creeper.

All goes well for twenty or thirty minutes and then...

Food and bed. Thats all I could pull off. Paralyzed,...‚Äù
